mainContent.heading: What is the Image with Text Section?
paragraphs: The Image with Text section is a versatile Shopify section that displays images and text side by side in a clean, structured layout.
It allows store owners to clearly communicate product details, brand messages, or supporting content while keeping the design visually balanced and easy to read.
This section fits naturally into any storefront and is suitable for both promotional content and informational blocks without distracting customers.

features.title: Precise Layout
features.description: Align content to the left, right, or center to match your page structure.

features.title: Image Configuration
features.description: Control image size, position, radius, and display style for better visual balance.

features.title: Caption Text
features.description: Add optional captions or supporting text to provide additional context.

features.title: Content Padding
features.description: Adjust top, bottom, and side spacing for a clean and consistent layout.

instructions.heading: How to Add This Section to Shopify?

steps.title: Get in Touch

steps.title: Receive the Section

steps.title: Section Setup
steps.description: Adjust the section settings in the Theme Editor to match your layout and content. No code required.

steps.title: Review & Publish
steps.description: Review the section in your store and publish it to your live storefront.
